text.div:
Observation Value Absent Reason

This value set defines the set of codes for identifying the reason why the expected result in Observation.value[x] is missing.

This value set includes codes from the following code systems:

  • Include all codes defined in http://hl7.org/fhir/data-absent-reason

name: Observation Value Absent Reason
publisher: HL7 International - Orders and Observations WG
description: This value set defines the set of codes for identifying the reason why the expected result in Observation.value[x] is missing.
